section.name: What is it?
section.p: The jSPF library is pure Java SPF implementation. It was designed to match the current SPF-Specs of 2006 (See RFC section). SPF is also knows as Sender Policy Framework. It was designed to detect email spoofing.This is the solution if you ever was tired of getting spam from yourself. For more informations see openspf website

subsection.p: After a fully rewrite of spf-java we finally release jSPF.
